Function Documentation

OPJ_BOOL opj_event_msg (  opj_event_mgr_t *  event_mgr,
OPJ_INT32  event_type,
const char *  fmt,
... 
) 
 

Write formatted data to a string and send the string to a user callback.

Parameters:
event_mgr Event handler
event_type Event type or callback to use to send the message
fmt Format-control string (plus optional arguments)
Returns:
Returns true if successful, returns false otherwise

void opj_set_default_event_handler (  opj_event_mgr_t *  p_manager  ) 
 

Set the event manager with the default callback function for the 3 levels.
